item.title: 5-SPICE FRIED RICE WITH SWEET POTATOES
item.author: tom.andrew.wilson@gmail.com (Thomas Wilson)
item.description: 5-SPICE FRIED RICE WITH SWEET POTATOES yields 4 AS A SIDE OR YOUR LONELY ASS FOR A COUPLE ingredients 1 medium sweet potato (¾ to 1 LB) 2 tsp neutral-tasting oil (Grapeseed/peanut/sesame) 2 TBL water 1/2 small yellow onion 1 carrot carrot 1/4 tsp Chinese 5-spice powder 1 to 2 clove garlic to 2 clove garlic 1 1/2 TBL soy sauce or tamari 1 TBL rice vinegar 1 tsp chili paste or an Asian-style hot sauce like Sriracha 4 cup cooked short-grain brown rice that’s been chilled for a couple hours 1 cup bitter greens (watercress/mustard/arugula) 1/2 cup sliced green onions 1 cup frozen green peas, thawed instructions 0 chop onion, carrot, and greens no bigger than a quarter

item.title: Meatballs Marsala with Egg Noodles and Chives
item.author: tom.andrew.wilson@gmail.com (Thomas Wilson)
item.description: Meatballs Marsala with Egg Noodles and Chives ingredients TBL olive oil 2 TBL butter 1 small yellow onion 1 tsp salt 1/2 cup panko 1 large egg 1/4 cup milk 1/4 cup dry Marsala 3 TBL butter 3 TBL flour 1 3/4 cup chicken stock 1/4 cup heavy cream 12 oz egg noodles 1 TBL butter 4 tsp chives
